name: Acute Vault
desc: Curl into a ball and rush forward while spinning, damaging enemies in your path.

name: Deadly Pierce
desc: Approach the enemy in a flash and perform a lethal thrust that deals Dark damage. Damage is increased when attacking from behind.

name: Acute Vault
desc: Curl into a ball and rush forward while spinning, damaging enemies in your path.

name: Wild Dive
desc: Leap into the air and dive down, creating a shockwave. Damages and knocks back enemies around you.

name: Banishing Scratch
desc: Move faster than the eye can follow, dealing damage to all enemies around you.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Poison Gadget, to toss a jar of poison.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Poison Gadget, to toss a jar of poison.

name: Heavy Attack/Switch Weapon
desc: Do a roundhouse kick and send the enemy flying. Hold to switch from your sniper rifle to a rapid-fire machine pistol that auto-aims at enemies in the reticle.

name: Vorpal Strike
desc: Take aim and release a high-speed lunging thrust. Hold to build up power and deal greater damage.

name: Nightmare Rain
desc: A graceful combo that deals Fire and Water damage.

name: Horizontal Square
desc: Perform an ultra-fast combo and then attack the surrounding area with a shockwave.

name: Starburst Stream
desc: Unleash a chaotic 16-hit combo. The final blow deals massive damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Sonic Leap, a charging slash attack.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Sonic Leap, a charging slash attack.

name: Glorious Rocket
desc: Fires a rocket that flies straight ahead. Deals Elemental damage based on the Element set with Bullet Change.

name: Flying Burst
desc: Reload and leap high into the air. Recoil from shooting while airborne will push you even higher.

name: Healing Grenade
desc: Fires a round that creates a healing field where it lands. Allies within the field regenerate health.

name: Ultra Mega Grenade Toss
desc: Lob a massive, watermelon-sized plasma grenade which deals Electric Elemental damage to anything caught in the explosion.

name: Heavy Attack/Switch Weapon
desc: Strike your foes with your hefty grenade launchers. Hold to toggle between your twin grenade launchers and handgun.

name: Randomize State
desc: Inflicts a random status effect to enemies in an area in front of you. if Pixie Mode is active, party members in the area will receive random buffs.

name: Satellite Orb
desc: Creates a pair of orbs that circle you. The orbs deal Fire damage to enemies they touch and protect you from projectiles. If Pixie Mode is active, all party members gain this effect.

name: Cheer
desc: Restores some HP to all party members. If Pixie Mode is active, more HP is restored.

name: Object Eraser
desc: Use a massive flaming sword to perform a powerful slash, dealing heavy Fire damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Floating Sphere, a homing attack.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Floating Sphere, a homing attack.

name: Mirage Fang
desc: Slash at enemies while rapidly dashing from side to side.

name: Blind & Blitz
desc: After staggering the opponent with Water Elemental Damage using Pina's Bubble Breath, rush at them and knock them back.

name: Healing Breath
desc: Pina releases a healing breath into the surrounding area. Heals all party members' HP and grants automatic HP recovery for a set time.

name: Unison Rush
desc: Silica and Pina team up for a combo. Pina uses her Light Elemental breath to cover Silica. The final attack deals massive damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Canine, a rush in a low stance.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Canine, a rush in a low stance.

name: Zekkuu
desc: Rush forward and unleash a powerful quick-draw slash. Hold to build up power and deal greater damage.

name: Zangetsu
desc: Send out a swift cross-slash. Deals Fire damage.

name: Gengetsu
desc: A feinting quick-draw technique that releases a shockwave. The shockwave has a chance to stun enemies.

name: Zangetsu
desc: Send out a swift cross-slash. Deals Fire damage.

name: Sanka
desc: A series of elegant attacks resembling a flower. The final blow deals massive damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Ukifune, a rising slash.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Ukifune, a rising slash.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Ukifune, a rising slash.

name: Fighting Blade
desc: Perform a combo using sword skills honed by kendo.

name: Flying Gust
desc: Slash upward and leap into the air. After the slash, recover some of your flight gauge and remain hovering. Deals Wind damage.

name: Healing Wind
desc: Grants automatic HP recovery to all party members for a period of time.

name: Flying Gust
desc: Slash upward and leap into the air. After the slash, recover some of your flight gauge and remain hovering. Deals Wind damage.

name: Flying Gust
desc: Slash upward and leap into the air. After the slash, recover some of your flight gauge and remain hovering. Deals Wind damage.

name: Tyrant's Hurricane
desc: Unleash a massive tornado in the targeted area, damaging and pulling in surrounding enemies. Deals Wind Damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. An input after a Normal Attack combo will branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Gale Sweep, a dash into a rising slash.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. An input after a Normal Attack combo will branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Gale Sweep, a dash into a rising slash.

name: Heartbeat Breaker
desc: A skillful barrage of mace attacks.

name: Thunder Pile
desc: Shoots lightning in a straight line from the tip of your mace. Deals Electric damage and has a chance to stun.

name: Heartbeat Breaker
desc: A skillful barrage of mace attacks.

name: Grand Forge
desc: Crushes foes with a gigantic magic hammer. Party members within the area of the attack receive an Attack buff.

name: God of Thunder
desc: Violently slam your mace and call down lightning upon the enemy. Deals Electric damage and is guaranteed to stun.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Weapon Shot, unleashing 3 magic daggers.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Weapon Shot, unleashing 3 magic daggers.

name: Sonic Bomb
desc: Set a sonic bomb in front of you. Hitting it with soundwave shots makes it send out a shockwave, increasing its damage and explosion radius.

name: Are You Ready?
desc: Unleash a shockwave in front of you and trigger the cooldown of Raise the Voltage!. Foes marked with musical notes also release shockwaves at their location.

name: Voltage Wave
desc: Unleashes a number of Wind Elemental sonic shockwaves around you. The higher your Voltage Gauge, the more shockwaves released.

name: Yuna On Stage
desc: Conjure up a concert stage, damaging foes and reviving allies in the area. Completely fills the Voltage Gauge when activated.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Ballad Blast, unleashing a sonic shockwave in front of you.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Ballad Blast, unleashing a sonic shockwave in front of you.

name: Star Splash
desc: Unleash a brilliant combo of thrusts and slashes.

name: Delta Attack
desc: Perform a set of triangular slashes before attacking the surrounding area with a shockwave.

name: Shining Thrust
desc: A powerful flurry of thrusts, damaging all enemies in a straight line ahead of it. Deals Light damage.

name: Flashing Penetrator
desc: Rush forward, leaving a trail of light behind you. Deals massive damage to enemies in a straight line.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Shooting Star, a swift charging thrust.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Shooting Star, a swift charging thrust.

name: Sliding Shot
desc: Shoot while sliding. Hitting an enemy with the slide will trigger a follow-up somersault kick.

name: Rampaging Bunny
desc: Perform a combo with your knife and gun.

name: Bomb Drop
desc: Toss a number of grenades in front of you. Deals Fire damage.

name: Rabbit Onslaught
desc: Attack with every weapon in LLENN's arsenal dealing massive damage.

name: Heavy Attack/Switch Weapon
desc: Rush forward and perform a knife combo. Hold to toggle between your submachine gun and dual handguns.

name: Electric Bullet
desc: Load and fire a round that explodes on impact. The explosion deals Electric damage and has a chance to stun.

name: Star Splash
desc: Pierce the enemy with an imperceptibly fast flurry of thrusts.

name: Reaper's Shadow
desc: Grants temporary concealment and increased movement speed. While active, use additional input to release Shooting Star.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: A rapid thrust attack with an estoc. Press repeatedly to use Estoc Combo.

name: Execution
desc: Take aim with your pistol and unleash a deadly shot. If Death Enhancement is active, consume all Death Marks to increase damage.

name: Disc Grenade
desc: Toss a disc-shaped grenade that explodes on contact. Deals Fire damage.

name: Gravity Bullet
desc: Fire a special bullet that triggers a gravity explosion at the point of impact, pulling enemies in. Deals Dark damage.

name: Tri-Burst
desc: Dodge backward while firing a spread of 3 shots in front of you.

name: Blast Shot
desc: Shoot a special round that explodes repeatedly along the shot's trajectory. Explosions inflict Fire damage.

name_text_id: エンハンス・アーマメント

name: Aurous Storm Blade
desc: Slash your surroundings with a powerful spinning attack. In EA mode, produce an osmanthus tornado around you that sweeps enemies up into the air.

name: Spiral Thrust
desc: Swiftly thrust ahead and send forth a spiral shockwave attack. In EA mode, the shockwave's range and number of hits increase.

name: Calendula Cutter
desc: Let rip a slashing attack from a quick-draw technique. Slashes deal Light damage and provoke any enemies hit. The slash flies further in EA mode.

name: Light Ray Concentration
desc: Fires a searing ray of concentrated light in a line directly ahead. Deals Light damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Bluewind Slash, a rising slash.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Bluewind Slash, a rising slash.

name: Vertical Square
desc: Unleashes a shockwave in the surrounding area after a swift combo.

name: Vertical Square
desc: Unleashes a shockwave in the surrounding area after a swift combo.

name: Devil's Judgment
desc: A furious combo that deals Dark damage. Applies a temporary debuff, preventing you from recovering more than your current HP at the time of casting.

name: Vorpal Strike
desc: Take aim and release a high-speed lunging thrust. Hold to build up power and deal greater damage.

name: Mother's Rosario
desc: Unleash a series of rapid strikes in a cross formation. The final blow deals massive damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Sharp Tornado, a rising slash.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Sharp Tornado, a rising slash.

name: Rapid Linear
desc: Lunge into a combo from a low stance. Cut through the enemy with your final strike and end up behind them.

name: Fierce Combo
desc: A barrage of acrobatic attacks.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Dual Cutter, to attack the area around you.

name: Phantom Twister
desc: Unleashes a horizontal charged Wind Elemental spinning slash. The longer you hold and charge the attack, the more damage you inflict.

name: Nightmare Break
desc: A violent, acrobatic combo. The final attack deals massive damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Dual Cutter, to attack the area around you.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Dual Cutter, to attack the area around you.

name: Ruler's Judgment
desc: Call down black lightning in front of you. Deals Dark damage and has a chance to stun.

name: Noble Cremation
desc: Launches a massive fireball which explodes on impact. Deals Fire damage.

name: Cruel Dance
desc: An exquisite dance that unleashes a flurry of sword attacks.

name: Cruel Dance
desc: An exquisite dance that unleashes a flurry of sword attacks.

name: Summon Sword Golem
desc: Summon a Sword Golem and make it attack. It will perform a combo before disappearing.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Vorpal Strike, a high-speed thrust attack.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Vorpal Strike, a high-speed thrust attack.

name: Gravitational Field
desc: Creates a gravity field at the targeted location. Reduces movement speed and deals damage to enemies inside the field.

name: Great Excalibur
desc: Showers enemies in the targeted area with swords of light. Deals Light damage.

name: Cowardice Teleport
desc: Activate to create a teleportation point. Activate again before the portal expires to instantly return to it and deal area damage with an explosion.

name: King's Punishment
desc: Create a powerful dark magic field in front of you, damaging all enemies inside. Deals Dark damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Wind Cutter, to shoot out a slice of wind.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Wind Cutter, to shoot out a slice of wind.

name_text_id: エンハンスアーマメント

name: Ice Lance Onslaught
desc: Sends forth a wave of ice lances along the ground. Deals Water damage and has a chance to freeze. In EA mode, the range expands.

name: Ice Lance Onslaught
desc: Sends forth a wave of ice lances along the ground. Deals Water damage and has a chance to freeze. In EA mode, the range expands.

name: Freezing Field
desc: Creates a cold zone in front of you. Deals damage over time to enemies inside the zone and has a chance of freezing them. Radius is wider in EA mode.

name: Rage Spike
desc: Rush towards the enemy and perform a sweeping attack. In EA mode, ice spears shoot out from the ground in conjunction with the sweeping attack.

name: Ice Lance Onslaught
desc: Sends forth a wave of ice lances along the ground. Deals Water damage and has a chance to freeze. In EA mode, the range expands.

name: Release Recollection
desc: Unleash your weapon's power to damage enemies in a wide area around you. Deals Water damage. Guaranteed to freeze.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Ice Discharge, to fire ice bullets.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold to use Ice Discharge, to fire ice bullets.

name: Divine Circle
desc: Release a charged-up spinning slash. Hold the button to charge it up and boost the damage.

name: Chivalric Phalanx
desc: Launches an energy shield in front of you. The shield catches enemy fire and damages enemies that touch it.

name: Paladin's Provocation
desc: Emits an aura that damages and provokes surrounding enemies. Buffs your Attack according to the number of provoked enemies.

name: Avenger
desc: A series of precise, aggressive sword strikes. The final attack deals massive damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Ruler's Banishment, a shielded charge & slash.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Ruler's Banishment, a shielded charge & slash.

name: Whirlwind
desc: Swing your axe, creating a tornado in front of you. The tornado lingers for a while and deals Wind damage.

name: Crescent Avalanche
desc: A powerful axe-swinging combo.

name: Crescent Avalanche
desc: A powerful axe-swinging combo.

name_text_id: トータルデストラクション

name: Brave Taunt
desc: Grants damage reduction buff and provokes nearby enemies.

name: Dynamic Bloodshed
desc: Swing your axe with tremendous force. Pulls nearby enemies towards you while dealing great damage.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Assault Slash, charging forward with axe in hand.

name: Heavy Attack
desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. Use after a Normal Attack combo to branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Assault Slash, charging forward with axe in hand.
